column1: Smoque BBQ////Their brisket is pure Texas.  Slow smoked
column3: and juicy.  The ribs are straight out of St. Louis with a delicious dry rub.  Have the sauce on the side and try 'em "dry" so to speak.  Don't let the sauce obscure the amazing flavors of smoke
column4: and the lip-smacking unctiousness of the pork.  And the pulled pork tastes almost exactly like the style from my hometown in Georgia.
